name: open-diabetes-filter
description: Allows programming OpenDiabetesFilters using Google Blockly

cli.title: Command Line Interface
cli.description: Path to your OpenDiabetesVault command line interface executable

version.title: CLI Version
version.description:
Used to check the version of your command line interface.
**Arguments:**
`cli`: path to your CLI executable.

init.title: ODV repository init
init.description:
Used to initialize an ODV repository.
**Arguments:**
`cli`: path to your CLI executable.
`path`: path to your current project.

import.title: ODV data import
import.description:
Used to import data into your ODV repository.
**Arguments:**
`cli`: path to your CLI executable.
`type`: import type
`files`: files to import.

process.title: ODV filter process
process.description:
Used to execute filters.
**Arguments:**
`cli`: path to your CLI executable.
`file`: relative path to process container.
`tag`: tag used for results
